description: Jupyter Interactive Widget State JSON schema.

___state.description: Model State for All Widget Models - keys are model ids, values are model state

___model_module.description: Name of the JavaScript module holding the model implementation

oneOf.description: Base 16 encoding, as specified in RFC 4648, section 8 (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4648#section-8)
Base 64 encoding, as specified in RFC 4648, section 4 (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4648#section-4)

___encoding.description: The encoding of the buffer data

___path.description: A path for a binary buffer value.

items.description: An object key or array index

___data.description: A binary buffer encoded as specified in the 'encoding' property

___model_module_version.description: Semver range for the JavaScript module holding the model implementation

___model_name.description: Name of the JavaScript class holding the model implementation
